entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sainte-Foy - Laval University 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Wind: km/h

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 80 gusting to 110 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to snow and blowing snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except 20 cm over northern sections. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 10 cm over northern sections. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
